question: 1. In a rectangular channel, when is the discharge maximum?

answers.a: when hydraulic mean depth is half of flow depth
answers.b: when hydraulic mean depth is twice of flow depth
answers.c: when hydraulic mean depth equals flow depth

question: 2. In a trapeziodal channel, when is the discharge maximum?

answers.a: top width is twice the sloping side
answers.c: half of top width equals the sloping side
